about_the_game:
The daily grind and the bustle of the big modern city can certainly put one in a fighting mood. Now you can bring all the modern fight into your RPG Maker projects with Modern-Day Menace Battlers!

Created by Thalzon, this imaginative battler pack features both staples such as cell-phone addicted youth and unique elements such as knife-yielding greaser pigeon. With 61 battlers to choose from, you're guaranteed to find just the right enemy for your contemporary game.

Features:

61 side-view static battlers, with or without shadows.
Modern humans such as businessman, postal worker, construction worker, tourist and more.
Battle everyday objects with clocks, computers and neon signs!
Brightly-colored and imaginative pieces that work with Thalzon's free battler designs.

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series only
* OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker Series
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
detailed_description:
Please read before you buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Modern Day Menace Battlers" and "RPG Maker MV - Modern Day Menace Battlers" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!
